description: Lightweight & packable comfort, widest range of size/shape options<br><br>Good for summer & fair weather use<br><br>The Ultra series, starting with the Ultra 1R, is comprised of ultra lightweight, compact sleeping mats featuring recycled 20 D ripstop face fabric, certified carbon neutral by myclimate. These mats are perfect for human-powered adventures including backpacking, thru-hiking, bike packing, and alpinism.<br><br>EXPED's AIRMAT TECHNOLOGY™ provides insulation for fast and light adventures in warmer temperatures, while a 7 cm thick air cushion cradles the body. Air chambers run head to toe, fully supporting the body for an unrivaled night's sleep and giving maximum durability.
name: Ultra 1R - Medium

specs.value: Mat, schnozzel pumpbag, repair kit with glue and adhesive patches, stuff sack
